alert.note: Alert for Holmes; Washington (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 20 at 4:10PM EDT until July 20 at 5:00PM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: The National Weather Service in Tallahassee has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Central Holmes County in the Panhandle of Florida... North central Washington County in the Panhandle of Florida... * Until 400 PM CDT. * At 309 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 10 miles west of Bonifay, moving east at 15 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Bonifay, Ponce De Leon, Caryville, Esto, Westville, Miller Crossroads, Cerrogordo, Bethlehem, Gritney, Holland Crossroads, Ards Crossroads, Hulaw, Hickory Hill, Izagora, Baker Settlement, Poplar Head and Johnson Crossroads. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
